prompt: A new skating rink is being built. Should be done in time for Winter skating!
I had a huge conflict with my parents about moving to another country and I was simply enraged to have them trying to control my life.
I saw a huge cockroach outside my house today. We live in Texas so they are common but still gross!
I got lost when I 8 at the county gfair. I was looking  every where for my mom and could not find her I sated crying and didn't no what to do.
I am so glad I woke up every day.
One of my cats managed to lock himself in the bathroom the other night_comma_ and I still can't figure out how he did it. That's pretty amazing for having no opposable thumbs.
All my friends went away to colleges. I am the only one that is still here. It is very different.
I won $400 in a raffle. I can't wait to get it!
One time my brother stole my Nintendo 64. I was so mad at him i went into his room and beat him up.
